FOLDER:Airspace
COLOR:Standard

FOLDER:Airspace
COLOR:DFSGrey
LAYER:-2
STYLE:Solid:1
ACTIVE:RWY:ARR:EDDF25R:DEP:*

ACTIVE:RWY:ARR:EDDF25C:DEP:*
ACTIVE:RWY:ARR:EDDF07R:DEP:*
ACTIVE:RWY:ARR:EDDF07L:DEP:*

ACTIVE:RWY:ARR:*:DEP:EDDF25C
